text:
Answer:
The higher dividend payout ratio supports Holt having a higher P/E ratio than
the industry.
Higher growth in sales suggests that Holt will be able to increase dividends at a
faster rate, which supports Holt having a higher P/E ratio than the industry.
The higher level of debt, however, indicates that Holt has higher risk and a higher
required return on equity, which supports Holt having a lower P/E ratio than the
industry.
